programme.title: Lyla in the Loop
programme.desc: Lyla gets a strike her first time bowling but gets frustrated when she realizes bowling isn't as easy as she thought it was; Lyla feels left out when Everett and Ale's friendship thrives.(n)

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Tamir leaves for robotics camp; he needs to figure out how to keep the garden watered while he is away; with help from his friends, Tamir makes a drip irrigation system so that the community garden can get plenty of water.(n)
